title: Subsets?
content:
Dear all,

I'm not sure this is the right forum, so my apologies if this post is misplaced.

I'm looking for an option in Adobe Acrobat Professional to make one book  
subdivided in stapled sets.  
This means that I have e.g. 10 pdf documents which should be Combined as a Binder, BUT as chapters.  
How can this be done?

I'd be very happy with some tips to solve this issue or information where to obtain information about this.

thanks!

Bas Schouten
author: Bas_Schouten

comments.content: A good copy shop can do this for you, but Acrobat can't...

Might PDF Portfolios work for this? I haven't tried these out, but they are a way of combining separate files (in various formats, including PDF) in a single entity.

Good luck,  
David
